Package org.gbif.dwc

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DwcaStreamWriter.RowWriteHandler  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Archive
    Represents a Darwin Core Archive and its components (metadata, core, extensions).
    ArchiveField
    Container object representing a metafile content <field> element as defined in the Darwin Core Text Guide.
    ArchiveFile
    This class encapsulates information about a file contained within a Darwin Core Archive.
    DwcaStreamWriter
    An archive writer that writes entire data files at once and does not check integrity of coreids.
    DwcaWriter
    Simple writer class to create valid Darwin Core Archives using tabular data files.
    DwcFiles
    Collections of static methods to work with Darwin Core (archive) files.
    MetaDescriptorWriter
    Utils class to write a meta.xml descriptor file.
    SimpleSaxHandler
    A simple metadata SAX base handler that collects all character data inside elements into a string buffer, resetting the buffer with every element start and storing the string version of the buffer in this.content when the end of the element is reached.
    TabWriter  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ArchiveField.DataType  
    DwcLayout
    A DarwinCore file can be represented under different "layout".
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    MetadataException
    Exception indicating invalid or non existing metadata.
    UnsupportedArchiveException
